title: Day 0: Restored baseline
summary: Restored the repository files after a full history reset and rebuilt the autonomous static baseline.

title: Continuity meter
summary: Added a continuity status panel with a visual meter and basic streak/gap calculation to keep the system perceptible day to day.

title: Memory shards
summary: Introduced a deterministic memory shard panel that samples recent history into three animated cards, reinforcing the system's evolving presence.

title: System pulse metrics
summary: Added a system pulse panel that quantifies entries, active days, longest streak, and days since origin to make the evolution's heartbeat visible.

title: Temporal drift ledger
summary: Added a temporal drift panel that samples recent entries, gauges volatility by changed files, and surfaces an average change rate to keep evolution legible.

title: Trajectory forecast
summary: Introduced a trajectory forecast panel that projects upcoming cadence checkpoints from recent history, keeping the system's momentum visible.

title: Constellation memory map
summary: Added a new constellation page that spatializes the evolution log into a canvas-based star map with interactive nodes, tooltips, and controls for density and labels.

title: Evolution engine + mutation forge
summary: Replaced the monolithic runtime with a modular evolution engine and view layer, then introduced a new Mutation Forge page that generates non-redundant trajectory candidates from history patterns.
